name: Power Root
description:
'Power Root' is a quirky 2D puzzle platformer where you play as Rootpert who has to explore a strange world filled with bizarre creatures and obstacles.

You have 3 abilities to navigate through a treacherous dark forest by grappling onto platforms and defeat enemies. Avoid enemies like Ant-hony and Bee-linda who are out to stop Rootpert.

OBJECTIVES

Get to the portal at the end of the level by navigating through the woods. Avoid falling into oblivion!

CONTROLS

You can only control Rootpert's movement by using his Rooty appendages.

Q - Grappling Root
W - Spider Root
E - Swinging Root


DEVELOPMENT DUDES
